TopicTitle: [1.4.3]ALCOR,"Advanced Landing Capsule for Orbital Rendezvous" by ASET (08/02/2017)

Articles.Content: that's bahamuto D's MK.1-2 propulsion system

Nice looking lander , what landing gear unit mod is that ?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/49035-WIP-Bahamuto-Dynamics-(Dockable-Fairings)-11-5-13
Thanks helix and sirkut ! going to have to add this to my ACLOR so smooth and neat.
I just wish they fit together a bit better. An ALCOR pod with a 2.5m base would be very nice. I always seem to end up with a 2.5m base below the ALCOR just to make it wide enough for bumpy landings.

I just wish they fit together a bit better. An ALCOR pod with a 2.5m base would be very nice. I always seem to end up with a 2.5m base below the ALCOR just to make it wide enough for bumpy landings.

The original plan was to make a series of special blocky tanks and adapters to go with it to make two-stage and single-stage landers, and at this point I was only researching stuff for alexustas. But then he wanted a monitor. Since Firespitter's monitor wasn't enough, I ended up making a monitor and that sidetracked us into the IVA-making department.

This one I rescaled it down to .5 from .625

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/49035-WIP-Bahamuto-Dynamics-%28Dockable-Fairings%29-11-5-13

The original plan was to make a series of special blocky tanks and adapters to go with it to make two-stage and single-stage landers, and at this point I was only researching stuff for alexustas. But then he wanted a monitor. Since Firespitter's monitor wasn't enough, I ended up making a monitor and that sidetracked us into the IVA-making department.

And you guys have made some ridiculously awesome stuff in the process. I'm sure you guys will get back to the externals eventually

this thing is big enough?

How about 8 Kerbals?

Is this available or is it a concept pic

Is this available or is it a concept pic

Concept pic, I'm afraid.
That part is NEEDED..... Wow..... who do we need to beg for that one...

That part is NEEDED..... Wow..... who do we need to beg for that one...

Alexustas, after the 20th when he's back from vacation.
Really good stuff. I appreciate all of the hard work that is put into these parts. They make all of our designs so much better. Thanks to all.
Bummer this is a concept pic it would look good with a central hub alcor pod on top and some inflatable tubes to link the lot all together

Drats,Looks like the camera only works with you pod from what i have been seeing. Would be nice if it was to pop up on the side kinda liek the docking camera from Romfarer's lazor mod. As I had a forward cam on a space plane to help me try to land it, but didn't know how to make it work then came here and was reminded that it was for this pod. I really LOVE the pod and this mod you have put together, but would be nice to have a Space plane version of this pod for us that like to SSTO, Or make a Space shuttle like launch.

Drats,Looks like the camera only works with you pod from what i have been seeing. Would be nice if it was to pop up on the side kinda liek the docking camera from Romfarer's lazor mod. As I had a forward cam on a space plane to help me try to land it, but didn't know how to make it work then came here and was reminded that it was for this pod. I really LOVE the pod and this mod you have put together, but would be nice to have a Space plane version of this pod for us that like to SSTO, Or make a Space shuttle like launch.

I use the external camera on a KOSMOS TKS-VA spacecraft, and on its launch vehicle. You do have to edit the MFD's config file, although you may be better off using one in the RasterPropMonitor mod, so you don't change the functionality of the ALCOR displays.

Great addon, but im running into an issue. Any time I fly a craft with this pod, after a few minutes (sometimes as few as 3, once as long as 15), my computer crashes and has to restart. Don't remember the exact error message, something about a graphic not being greater than or equal. I'm using Windows 8 if it's any help. Any idea what's causing this? I really do enjoy the pod, but this is kinda ruining it for me at this point.

Great addon, but im running into an issue. Any time I fly a craft with this pod, after a few minutes (sometimes as few as 3, once as long as 15), my computer crashes and has to restart. Don't remember the exact error message, something about a graphic not being greater than or equal. I'm using Windows 8 if it's any help. Any idea what's causing this? I really do enjoy the pod, but this is kinda ruining it for me at this point.

...Wait, the entire computer crashes? Sounds like a graphics driver problem, (There is basically no way to crash the computer from managed code other than by triggering a driver bug) which we're unfortunately powerless to fix. Try updating the graphics drivers?
ok thanks!
I love this dearly, but man, the mass-per-kerbal sure is ridiculously low in comparison to anything else right now.
... Except the stock 1-kerbal lander cans.
.23 appears to have broken the IVA monitors.

you must donwload the new RPM version sperately but ask Mihara beforehand if the new version is backwards compatible with the pod. A update of the pod itself won't come until 20th as stated by Mihara several times, Alexustas is in vacation until that particular date

It is unrealistic to allow 3 kerbals in this tiny lander. I edited it to make it 2 and I highly recommend the OP do the same because there is no way in hell 3 kerbals can fit in there. Its not realistic and kind of cheating. I recommend deleting one of the pilot seats and just having the one pilot seat and pull down back seat. and I really think the interior should be made smaller because this thing is about 1/4th the size of the real life ascent stage of the apollo LEM but from looking at the IVA seems to have the same interior size as it.

Edited December 18, 2013 by Zander
